meanings.definition: Distorted from the normal or accepted course of events.
meanings.sent1: The perverted clock in the movie ran backwards.
meanings.sent2: His perverted sense of humor always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent3: The perverted twist in the plot caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her perverted view of reality made her question everything.
meanings.sent5: The perverted mirror reflected a distorted image of the room.

meanings.definition: Deviating from what is considered moral or proper.
meanings.sent1: The perverted behavior of the villain shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his perverted jokes that crossed the line.
meanings.sent3: The perverted cat stole all the treats from the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The perverted road led him astray from his values.
meanings.sent5: Her perverted actions were met with disapproval from society.

meanings.sent1: The perverted tree had branches growing in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The perverted mind of the criminal plotted sinister schemes.
meanings.sent3: The perverted cookie dough resulted in oddly shaped cookies.
meanings.sent4: His perverted sense of justice favored the wrong side.
meanings.sent5: The perverted river flowed in a twisted path through the valley.
